oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Raman spectra catalogue for inclusions in diamond
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Smith, Evan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A reference collection of Raman spectra for identifying inclusions in diamond. The catalogue contains spectra from real inclusions, as well as relevant mineral specimens and experimental products. Some spectra have been digitized from published figures, as a set of x-y coordinates.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Chemistry
Earth and Environmental Sciences
